Invoking Remote Operations¶

Operations which require involvement of the remote WebMynd build servers

class webmynd.remote.Remote(config)[source]¶

Wrap remote operations

build(development=True, template_only=False)[source]¶

Start a build on the remote server.

NB: this method blocks until the remote build has completed!

Parameters:
  • development – if True, we will not do any packaging of the build; it will be left in an expanded directory layout
  • template_only – internal use only: if True we will not use the “user” code - we will just recreate the app templates using the current app configuration
Returns:

the primary key of the build
Raises Exception:
 

if any errors occur during the build
fetch_unpackaged(build_id, to_dir='development')[source]¶

Retrieves the unpackaged artefacts for a particular build.

Parameters:
  • build_id – primary key of the build
  • to_dir – directory that will hold all the unpackged build trees
get_app_config(build_id)[source]¶

Fetch remote App configuration and save to local file

Parameters:build_id – primary key of the build to consider
Returns:the location of the newly-downloaded app configuration
get_latest_user_code(to_dir='user')[source]¶

Fetch the customer’s code archive attached to this app

Parameters:to_dir – directory to place the user code into
Raises Exception:
 if the :param:`to_dir` already exists
latest()[source]¶

Get the ID of the latest completed production build for this app.

server[source]¶

The URL of the build server to use (default http://www.webmynd.com/api/)
